page.description: Returns the first day of the month for a given date. If no argument is supplied, first day of current month.
page.syntax: First Date as D = date_FirstDayOfMonth([D date ])

argument.name: First Date
argument.description: The first date of a month.

argument.name: date
argument.description: Optional. Default = today. The date to use when calculating the first day of the month.

page.discussion: The Date_FirstDayOfMonth() function returns the first day of a month.
